data.title: Try this flick … ‘Easy Money’ … if you like Rodney Dangerfield, you’ll love this one
data.meta_description: Try this flick … “Easy Money.” Here is Rodney Dangerfield’s first film in which he was the headliner. Of course, he made his big-screen mark with “Caddyshack” and would have a better effort in his next film as a headliner (“Back to School” – click here for my review), but “Easy Money” is simply fall-down…
data.text:
Try this flick … “Easy Money.” Here is Rodney Dangerfield’s first film in which he was the headliner. Of course, he made his big-screen mark with “Caddyshack” and would have a better effort in his next film as a headliner (“Back to School” – click here for my review), but “Easy Money” is simply fall-down funny, too. You get Rodney being Rodney: His daughter is getting married to a slightly sleazy guy and he has to endure a gantlet of self-restraint to get an inheritance that should be “Easy Money.” Well, I don’t need to write anything other than “Rodney Dangerfield” if you are a fan. Otherwise, I’d recommend watching “Easy Money” because it is simply hilarious.

So, I’m doing a sometimes recommendation of a movie or TV show … and they’re all movies or TV shows that I’ve reviewed on this blog.

Click here to read my review of “Easy Money”

Click here to see a list of all the movies I’ve reviewed
